title: How Is the Weather Today?
description: How Is the Weather Today? introduces readers to various types of weather that occur during each season. The text discusses typical activities and clothing for each type of weather. Supportive illustrations accompany the text.
meta: blow, fall, icy, seasons, showers, snowman, spring, stormy, summer, weather, weatherman, windy, winter
Use the reading strategy of visualization to understand and remember factual information
Story Elements : Identify characters and setting
Segment Onset and Rime : Segment onset from rime
Nouns : Locate and read nouns in text
Compound Words : Identify and form compound words

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
